NOTICE: Do not change this file. Finally, This docs will be help you.

help.first: If you are first user about this program, 'imaptransmission help'
help.usage:
Welcome to PIT [raspberry-'P'i 'I'MAP 'T'ransmission] 

  Usage : imaptransmission [command argument]
  Description : This CLI program just need only one arguemnt 
  Command Arguments 
    start : Check folder on your email account each 5 second 
            and Get torrent files, The files will be transport to transmission 
    stop : Stop to check folder on your email account 
    status : Print out this program status what dead or alive and running status 
    restart : run stop and start. It's simple 
    help : Print out how to usage 
    test : If you first user about this program, 
            This command Check your modified configurations

add_success.subject: [PET][Add Success]{subject}
add_success.content:
PET Success for adding torrent on transmission

  • Torrent Name : {name}
  • Downlaod Directory : {downloadDir}
  • Size of download file when done : {sizeWhenDone}
  • Downlaod Files:{files}

Help: dydwls121200@gmail.com

add_fail.subject: [PET][Add Fail]Opps! Occured errors
add_fail.content:
While adding download queue Transmission web controller has occured errors.

Please check tranmission queue. This program don't know yet whether few of files were barely successed.

There was an error of your attachments or System Environment

    {files}

Help: dydwls121200@gmail.com

delete_success.subject: [PET][Completely download & Delete completed] Contratulation!! Downloading is done!
delete_success.content:
PET deleted completely downloaded torrent.

If you use Dropbox and Google Drive, PET recommand to change download path for there service

Description

  • Name : {name}
  • Download Directory : {downloadDir}
  • Size of download file When done : {sizeWhenDone}
  • Files{files}

Help : dydwls121200@gmail.com

delete_fail.subject: [PET][Completely download. but, didn't delete to completed torrent] Opps!! Occured an error!!
delete_fail.content:
torrent is completely downloaded. but, PET can't delete torrent in download queue

If you use Dropbox and Google Drive, PET recommand to change download path for there service

Description

  • Name : {name}
  • Download Directory : {downloadDir}
  • Size of download file When done : {sizeWhenDone}
  • Files{files}

Help : dydwls121200@gmail.com
